name: AZAZEL (subalterngames)
description:
Aaron shall take two goats and let them stand before the LORD.
Aaron shall bring forward the first goat, which he is to offer as a sacrifice;
while the second goat shall be sent off to the wilderness of Azazel.
Thus he shall purge the Israelites of sin.

- Leviticus 16:7, 9-10, 16
 One goat is sent into the wilderness. One goat is sacrificed. But the sacrificed goat survived. Wherever it goes, sin and chaos follow. You are that goat. Find the other goat. Playtime: 20 minutes Interface: Unicode (Hebrew) Goats: 2 Game by Seth Alter Music and Sound by Julian K. Jarboe
